agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Articles I, IV & V TIME & DATE: 7:30 AM, Wednesday, March 6, 2019 PLACE: JHR 100 CHAIR: Rep. Oscar Longoria The Appropriations Subcommittee on Articles I, IV, and V will meet in a formal meeting to discuss riders. As a reminder no public or agency testimony may be taken during a Formal Meeting.
